subject: College Athletics
Football
Heisman Trophy
lead_paragraph: Texas’ Colt McCoy, Florida’s Tim Tebow, Alabama’s Mark Ingram and Stanford’s Toby Gerhart are the four likeliest contenders, and all but Gerhart will play on Saturday.
snippet: Texas’ Colt McCoy, Florida’s Tim Tebow, Alabama’s Mark Ingram and Stanford’s Toby Gerhart are the four likeliest contenders, and all but Gerhart will play on Saturday.
